name: physiognomic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the physical appearance of the face: The people here did not match the physiognomic stereotype of Pacific islanders. As an artist, he excels in the faithful representation of physiognomical details.
More examplesFewer examplesEach of the sculptures has strongly individualistic physiognomic traits which distinguish it from the others in the series.She was intrigued by the physiognomical resemblances between the two women.Traditional Japanese art places great importance on physiognomic expression.He became increasingly interested in the physiognomical characteristics of criminals.
